name: Koss QZ99B Koss QZ-99 Noise Reduction Stereophone

reviews.name: Koss QZ99 Passive Noise-Canceling Full-Size Headphones, Black
reviews.reviewText: I am a dialysis patient where the TV's are mounted on the wall in front of each patient (about 20). Person speakers offer no protection from the audio of those around you. If they have hearing problems, they turn the volume way up. The headsets I had did not drown them out, often making listening to my personal music virtually impossible. These headphone totally (almost) block out outside noises. I have to take them off to clearly understand people standing beside me. Better headphones than I anticipated, especial for than price.
reviews.title: Great in filtering environmental noise

reviews.name: Koss QZ99 Passive Noise-Canceling Full-Size Headphones, Black
reviews.reviewText:
Great Quality Headphones and built tough for metal detecting. Koss makes these just for that reason.
Can't Beat the Price.
Buy it you won't be disappointed! (and I don't work for Koss or Wal-Mart but I like to MD)
reviews.title: Great for Metal Detecting

reviews.name: Koss QZ99 Passive Noise-Canceling Full-Size Headphones, Black
reviews.reviewText:
I BOUGHT THESE AS A GIFT FOR MY SIS , I WILL BUY A PAIR FOR MYSELF AFTER CHRISTMAS
SHE RAVES ABOUT THEM ALL THE TIME
reviews.title: GREAT , JUST MUSIC , NO NOISE

reviews.name: Koss QZ99 Passive Noise-Canceling Full-Size Headphones, Black
reviews.reviewText: I work in a security console with ambient server noise and radio crosstalk these headphones are perfect for this environment, I can hear what I need to hear but also listen to music or communicate with other officers at will. Thanks, good value, good service.
reviews.title: excellent headphones

reviews.name: Koss QZ99 Passive Noise-Canceling Full-Size Headphones, Black
reviews.reviewText: While yes they are the only thing you hear when you put them on, they can be extremely quiet to those who use over the ear headphones. And no that's too quiet for near 40 dollars.
reviews.title: Not what I expected
